data.meta_description: Forbes is a global media company, focusing on business, investing, technology, entrepreneurship, leadership, and lifestyle.

Why Is This Colorado Church Putting Its Chapel On The Blockchain?

Thanks to an opportunistic real estate broker, a network of churches in Northern Colorado is embracing blockchain technology to securitize their sanctuary. Pray for its investors.
